CustomField.description: This is the name of the certificate to generate PKCE challenge/verifier responses. This can be any certificate (even if it's expired!). The encrypted value of the state is subsequently hashed and used as a challenger for PKCE flow. There is no security issue in using an expired cert either as it's not necessary verify the integrity of the hashed value downstream or anywhere else
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the name of the certificate to generate PKCE challenge/verifier responses. This can be any certificate (even if it's expired!). The encrypted value of the state is subsequently hashed and used as a challenger for PKCE flow. There is no security issue in using an expired cert either as it's not necessary verify the integrity of the hashed value downstream or anywhere else
CustomField.label: PKCE Signing Cert API Name
